com.example.mobilibrary

Class HomeFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.mobilibrary.HomeFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.widget.SearchView.OnQueryTextListener, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class HomeFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements android.widget.SearchView.OnQueryTextListener
    Author:
    Jill, Chloe; Homepage fragment that can be navigated to using navigation bar. Contains search bar, and access to the User profile. Shows list of all available or requested (but not accepted) books that are not the user's own (searchable). Can view book details by clicking on book.

    • Nested Class Summary
